Title.evidence: A Review of Randomised Controlled Trials in Thoracic Surgical Oncology

Trial_Design.evidence: The cohort was stratified by trial status, and characteristics were extracted, including start and completion dates, masking, and enrollment numbers.

Participants.evidence: Methods: The ClinicalTrials.gov database was queried in April 2023 to identify RCTs in patients with lung cancer undergoing surgery.

Objective.evidence: This study aims to understand the types of RCTs conducted in thoracic surgical oncology and their success rates.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The mean actual enrollment was lower than anticipated, with a 26% reduction in actual enrollment.
